SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
ArgumentException
Exception thrown when a player tries to place a card specifying a side different from 'FRONT' or 'BACK'.
AvailableColorMessage
The AvailableColorMessage class represents a message used to communicate the available colors which can be selected by a player.
BadTextException
Exception thrown when a player doesn't specify the receiver in a private text, or he tries to send an empty text
Card
Abstract class representing a generic Card with an ID and point value.
ChangeStateMessage
This class represents a message that indicates a change in the game state.
Chat
The chat class handles all the text messages sent by a player, either in public or in private chat
ChatSub
A ChatSub is a class which observes a Chat class in order to receive update from it.
ChoiceObjectiveMessage
The ChoiceObjectiveMessage class represents a message that updates the objective card in the client's model for the player who has selected the objective card.
ChooseObjectiveMessage
The ChooseObjectiveMessage class represents a message sent by the client to select his personal objective card
ChooseStartingMessage
The ChooseStartingMessage class represents a message sent by the client to select the side of his starting card
Client
This is the interface that handles all the communication methods, it will be implemented by the two classes that handles the connection with RMI and TCP
ClientModel
ClientModel is a class which handles the logic of the game and its status on client side
ClientRMI
Implementation of the Client interface using Remote Method Invocation (RMI) for game interaction.
ClientSocket
Represents a client-side socket connection to interact with a server for a game.
ClientTCPHandler
ClientTCPHandler is a class used to manage the connection to a client when connected over TCP.
CliView
Classes that manages the client over command line interface
Color
This enumeration lists the possible colors for the player's pawn
ColorAlreadyPickedException
Exception thrown when a player chooses an alredy chosen color
CommonObjectiveMessage
The CommonObjectiveMessage class represent a message to notify the players about the two common objective cards on the game table
ConfirmChatMessage
This message is sent to inform the client about the outcome of his request to send a chat message
ConfirmChooseObjectiveMessage
This message is sent to inform the client about the choice of his personal objective card
ConfirmDrawMessage
This message is sent to inform the client about the choice of his personal objective card
ConfirmGameMessage
This message is sent to inform the client about the creation of a game
ConfirmJoinGameMessage
This message is sent to inform the client about the outcome of his request to join the game
ConfirmMessage
This is an abstract type of message sent as confirmation to some operations
ConfirmPickColorMessage
This message is sent to inform the client about the choice of his color
ConfirmPlaceMessage
This message is sent to inform the client about the placing of a card
ConfirmRejoinGameMessage
This message is sent to inform the client about the outcome of his request to rejoin the game
ConfirmStartingCardMessage
This message is sent to inform the client about the choice of the side of his starting card
CoordinatesOutOfBoundsException
Exception thrown when a player tries to place a card specifying indexes less than 0 and greater then 81
Corner
Represents a corner with a visibility status, an occupancy status, and an item.
CornerItem
This enumeration lists the possible objects and kingdoms/resources that appear in a card's corner.
CornerNotVisibleException
Exception thrown when a player tries to place a card on an invisible corner
CrashedPlayerMessage
This message represents the notification to all the players connected in game about the crashing of a player
CreateGameMessage
This message represents the request to create a game
CurrentPlayerMessage
This message represents the notification to all the players connected in game about the new current player
Deck
Class employed to manage the decks of the game, which are GoldDeck, ResourceDeck, ObjectiveDeck and StartingDeck.
DrawGoldMessage
This message represents the request to draw a gold card
DrawResourceMessage
This message represents the request to draw a resource card
DrawTableMessage
This message represents the request to draw a card from the game table
Dshaped
Represents a specific type of objective card with a directional attribute, known as "Dshaped".
EmptyDeckException
Exception thrown when a player tries to draw a card from an empty deck
EmptyTextException
 
FinalColorsMessage
This message is used to update all the players about the color of each other
FirstHandMessage
This message represents the first notification sent to a player about his personal cards, his starting card and the two objective cards from which he will have to choose
FullLobbyException
Exception thrown when a user tries to join a game which has already started
Game
This class is used to handle the main logic of a Game
GameAlreadyCreatedException
Exception thrown when a user tries to create a game but a game already exists
GameController
The game controller ensures the communication between client controller and server model.
GameNotExistingException
Exception thrown when a user tries to make a move and a game hasn't been created yet
GameSub
A GameSub is a class which observes a Game class in order to obtain updates from it.
GameViewController
Controller for the GUI during the game
GoldCard
Represents a GoldCard which is a type of ResourceCard with specific requirements, scoring type, and object.
GoldDeck
Class employed to manage the deck which contains all Gold cards.
GroupChatMessage
This message represents the request to send a group message to all the players in the game
GUIController
Abstract class for the GUIControllers
GUIView
Gui Application Class
HeartbeatMessage
This message represents the heartbeat used to check the TCP connection between client and server
InvalidStateException
Exception thrown when a player tries to make a move during a game state that doesn't allow it
JoinedPlayerMessage
This message represents the notification to all players connected in game that a new player has joined the game
JoinGameMessage
This message represents the request to join a game
LastRoundMessage
This message represents the notification to all the players connected in game that the final round has started
Launch
The main entry point of the application.
LobbyViewController
GUIControllers that handles the lobby scene
LoginViewController
GUIController that handles the first scene shown when a player connects to the game
Lshaped
Represents a specific type of objective card with additional corner and second color attributes, known as "Lshaped".
Message
Abstract structure of a Message
MessageType
Enum representing all the type of messages sent over the network
NicknameAlreadyUsedException
Exception thrown when a player tries to join a game using a nickname that has already been chosen by another player
NoCardsAvailableException
Exception thrown when a player tries to place a card without covering any corner of the cards already placed
NotAllPlayersHaveJoinedException
 
NotifyCommonTableMessage
This message represents the notification to all players connected in game about one of the six cards on the game table that has changed
NotifyNumPlayersReachedMessage
This message represents the notification to all players connected in game that the number of player has been reached, so the game can start
NullCardSelectedException
Exception thrown when a player tries to draw a card from the common table and
ObjectiveCard
Represents an ObjectiveCard which extends the Card class.
ObjectiveDeck
Class employed to manage the deck which contains all Objective cards.
ObjectiveList
Represents a specific type of objective card known as "ObjectiveList".
ObjectiveType
This enumeration lists the possible types of objective for the objective cards
ParametersException
Exception thrown when a player tries to send a message to himself
PersonalCardsMessage
This message notifies the player who has drawn a card about their new cards in hand
PickColorMessage
This message represent the request to pick a color
PlaceCardMessage
This message represents the request to place a card
PlayableCard
Abstract class representing a playable card in the game.
Player
Represents a player in the game.
PlayerAbsentException
Exception thrown when a player tries to send a private message to a receiver that isn't part of the game
PlayerBoard
Represents the board of a player in the game.
PlayerBoardMessage
This message represents the notification to all players connected in game that a player has placed a card
PlayerBoardSub
A PlayerBoardSub is a class which observes a PlayerBoard class in order to obtain updates from it.
PlayerNotInTurnException
Exception thrown when a player tries to make a move during another player's turn
PlayerSub
A PlayerSub is a class which observes a Player class, in order to receive update from it.
Points
Enum class used to associate each score with its coordinates on the score board.
PositionOccupiedException
Exception thrown when a player tries to place a card in a position where there's already another card
PrivateChatMessage
This message represents the request to send a private message
RejoinedPlayerMessage
This message represents the notification to all players connected in game that player has rejoined the game
RejoinGameMessage
This message represents the request to rejoin the game
RemoteGameController
RemoteGameController interface provides methods to manage a remote game session.
RequirementsNotMetException
Exception thrown if a player tries to place a gold card but his board does not meet the requirements
ResourceCard
Represents a resource card, which is a type of playable card in the game.
ResourceDeck
Class employed to manage the deck which contains all Resource cards.
SceneType
Enum with the different types of scene in the view
ServerMain
The main server class that manages client connections and RMI setup.
StartingCard
Represents a starting card in the game, which is a type of playable card.
StartingCommonMessage
This message represents the first notification to all the players about the six cards that can be drawn from the game table
StartingDeck
Class employed to manage the deck which contains all Starting cards.
State
This enumeration lists the potential game's states.
Subscriber
A subscriber is a class which observe a model class in order to receive updates from it.
Text
Class text is used to implement the format of a Chat message
TurnOrderMessage
This message represents the notification to all the players in game about the players turn order
UnknownPlayerException
Exception thrown if a user attempts to make a move but has never been in the game
UpdateCrashedPlayerMessage
This message represents a notification to a rejoined player containing all the information of the game when the player rejoined to update his client model
UpdatePointsMessage
This message represents a notification to all the players connected in game that a player has earned points
ViewInterface
ViewInterface defines methods for updating the client-side view in response to game events.
WinnersMessage
This message represents the notification to all the players connected in game about the winners of the game
